name: Warm Humanist
description: Warm and human-centered conversational UI with serif fonts and cream background.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Conversational, approachable, and intelligent. Rejects the 'cold machine' aesthetic.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Cream, beige, off-white backgrounds. Dark warm gray for text (not pure black).
aiContext.componentGuidance: Serif font for both headings and body allowed. Pill-shaped buttons. Soft interactions.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure beige/cream backgrounds maintain contrast with text.
